responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "3CAD5A694BC02A853191088E6C58C7A1", "You are not the only adventurer seeking answers for your kin here at Bonfire. Others have brought me similar news.?\r\nThese Ramkin range far and wide from their encampments in the crags to attack our settlements and harry those newly come through the portal. I don\'t care what it is that they want any more, I want them run off the Mountainside.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_RunesingerNaho_12_Response
